short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix to viktorlab.cn/akdata/dps/ to properly assign the english name since Google Translate can't fix it

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: viktorlab.cn is usually translated with Google Translate. The character list, however, proves to be too difficult to translate. Well it turns out there is no need to translate the names. The English names are aleady part of the game data! This extension runs a script when loading the DPS calculator and replaces all Chinese names with the English versions.
